dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: We need to proceed to the castle and retrieve the ancient artifact.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Any idea what kind of obstacles we might face?

dialogues.speaker: Sarah
dialogues.text: We received reports of enemy presence in the area. Be prepared for a fight.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Alright, grab your gear. It's show time!
